amendment.description: To permit pilots to serve in multicrew covered operations until attaining 65 years of age.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2845 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 2845 proposed by Senator Murray for Senator Stevens. (consideration: CR S11386-11387; text: CR S11387) To permit pilots to serve in multicrew covered operations until attaining 65 years of age.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2845 proposed by Senator Murray for Senator Stevens.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2845 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
